about_the_game:
Take on a wicked corporation that rules the world with an iron fist in this hilarious over-the-top beat 'em up/hack n' slash!

-Uncensored Boss Fights See Retroninjacyberassassin completely uncut and uncensored, the gore that was too extreme for the main release!

The Cybersoul Corporation has taken over the world by using their financial power to influence governments, monopolizing every commercially available commodity, and privatizing the largest military on the planet. Now, a rogue cyborg ninja known only by his manufacturing number 6617 must help an investigative journalist take down the corporate giant by gathering evidence to expose the company's unethical practices.

content_descriptors.notes: Extreme, Relentless Violence and Gore, Nudity
